article.title: Kyrie Irving
article.description: The Boston Celtics, who have won 16 straight and own the league's best record, are rightly seen as strong contenders in the Eastern Conference this season, along with the three-time defending conference champion Cleveland Cavaliers.

article.description: Watch Derrick Jones Jr. #DriveByDunk Over a Human Don’t worry; no one was injured, but feelings were hurt but feelings were hurt

page.content: <h3>Defining Your Scheduled Task in Sitecore fdfd</h3> <p><span>If you have ever needed to upgrade or install Sitecore, then you will know a lot of your website's configuration settings are done in .config files, either in the web.config, or, the 'App_Config' directory. Creating your own custom scheduling agent is very similar.&nbsp;</span></p>
